original_title: Melvins: Salad of a Thousand Delights
overview: Salad Of A Thousand Delights is a home video by the Melvins, which was released in 1992 through Box Dog Video. Recorded live at the North Shore Surf Club, Olympia, Washington, May 16, 1991. The video was rereleased on DVD (90 mins) in 2003.
title: Melvins: Salad of a Thousand Delights
